text:
@realDonaldTrump Fake News? Coronavirus Fake? China needs cash? NO!
We have the worst unemployment!
You fly to Florida, while Riots all over the Nation because You cannot Lead the Country!
SIMPLE, IMPRISON the Other 3 officers!
It would stop if not reduce Rioting.
Use Water cannons!Not Bullets
